com.github.joschi.jersey.security

Class PemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.joschi.jersey.security.PemUtils

  • public final class PemUtils
extends Object
    Utility classes to extract PublicKey, PrivateKey, and X509Certificate from openssl generated PEM files
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Bill Burke
